article: bringing a swift conclusion to a two-day-old strike that had begun to inconvenience telephone customers from maine to virginia , bell atlantic employees returned to work tuesday after reaching a tentative agreement with management that insures that jobs in the company 's high-technology growth areas will go to union employees .
